article_title: Hospitals could pick up Idaho indigent-care costs
article_text: A change in the way Idaho counties handle indigent medical costs could shift tens of millions of dollars in expenses from local taxpayers onto hospitals and other health care providers.

article_metadata.news-keywords: indigent care, hospitals, St. Luke's Health System, Dan Chadwick, Idaho Association of Counties, Affordable Care Act
